# job_cancel

## Cancel a job

## Description
 Cancel a job. 


## Usage
```r
 
job_cancel(job = "latest") 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| job | Job name or job object. Pass "latest" to indicate the most recently submitted job. |
